# SwampEcoPkgs

An R package to install and load commonly used CRAN and Github packages by the author and affiliated analysts. Inspired by [poissonconsulting/poispkgs](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/poispkgs).

## Useage
```{r,eval=F}

library(SwampEcoPkgs)

```

## Installation

To install the latest development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/SwampThingPaul/SwampEcoPkgs)

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools");
devtools::install_github("SwampThingPaul/SwampEcoPkgs", dependencies = TRUE)
```
